Sentencas: Integrating systems are frequently encountered in the oil industry (oil-water-gas separators, distillation columns), power plants, paper-production plants, polymerisation processes, and in storage tanks.
Titulo: Parametric and Nonparametric PI Controller Tuning Method for Integrating Processes Based on Magnitude Optimum

Sentencas: Due to the non-self-regulating character of the processes, any disturbance can cause a drift of the process output signal.
Titulo: Parametric and Nonparametric PI Controller Tuning Method for Integrating Processes Based on Magnitude Optimum

Sentencas: Therefore, efficient closed-loop control of such processes is required.
Titulo: Parametric and Nonparametric PI Controller Tuning Method for Integrating Processes Based on Magnitude Optimum

Sentencas: There are many PI and PID controller tuning methods for integrating processes.
Titulo: Parametric and Nonparametric PI Controller Tuning Method for Integrating Processes Based on Magnitude Optimum

Sentencas: However, it is hard to find one requiring only a simple tuning procedure on the process, while the tuning method is based either on time-domain measurements or on a process transfer function of arbitrary order, which are the advantages of the magnitude optimum multiple integration (MOMI) tuning method.
Titulo: Parametric and Nonparametric PI Controller Tuning Method for Integrating Processes Based on Magnitude Optimum

Sentencas: In this paper, we propose the extension of the MOMI tuning method to integrating processes.
Titulo: Parametric and Nonparametric PI Controller Tuning Method for Integrating Processes Based on Magnitude Optimum

Sentencas: Besides the mentioned advantages, the extension provides efficient closed-loop control, while PI controller parameters calculation is still based on simple algebraic expressions, making it suitable for less-demanding hardware, like simpler programmable logic controllers (PLC).
Titulo: Parametric and Nonparametric PI Controller Tuning Method for Integrating Processes Based on Magnitude Optimum

Sentencas: Additionally, the proposed method incorporates reference weighting factor b that allows users to emphasize either the disturbance-rejection or reference-following response.
Titulo: Parametric and Nonparametric PI Controller Tuning Method for Integrating Processes Based on Magnitude Optimum

Sentencas: The proposed extension of the MOMI method (time-domain approach) was also tested on a charge-amplifier drift-compensation system, a laboratory hydraulic plant, on an industrial autoclave, and on a solid-oxide fuel-cell temperature control.
Titulo: Parametric and Nonparametric PI Controller Tuning Method for Integrating Processes Based on Magnitude Optimum
